headline: Delaware Ruling Supports Enforceability Of Forfeiture-for-competition Provisions
summary: On December 18, 2024, the Delaware Supreme Court held in LKQ Corp. v. Rutledge 1 that forfeiture-for-competition provisions in employee equity award agreements are enforceable in certain contexts....
